Employment History

Graduate Research Assistant May 2016 – Present
UA Little Rock Emerging Analytics Center, Little Rock, AR
  • Work on a team to create a virtual-reality video game shown at the ICAT-EGVE 2016 conference.
  • Develop a prototype tangible interface system for augmented-reality-based board gaming.
  • Demonstrate custom VR and AR applications to visitors from academia, the government, and the public.
  • Brainstorm project and research ideas with the full EAC team of students and staff.
  • Volunteer for setup, takedown, transportation, and general preparations for events both on- and off-site.
Graduate Teaching Assistant Spring Semester 2014 | Aug 2016 – May 2017
UA Little Rock Computer Science Department, Little Rock, AR
  • Graded assignments and programs for the undergraduate Operating Systems and Database Concepts courses.
  • Researched operating systems and database design to supplement my own knowledge.
  • Devised and executed a grading method to ensure equity across each class.
  • Worked directly with the instructors to validate my judgment as needed.
Graduate Assistant Aug 2015 – Jul 2016
UA Little Rock Computer Science Department, Little Rock, AR
  • Created and maintained web surveys for a study with UAMS and Arkansas Children’s Hospital.
  • Designed and implemented prototype web application and client software for geolocating UAVs (drones).
  • Provided one-on-one computer-science tutoring to undergraduate and high-school researchers.
  • Edited research papers to sharpen grammar, style, and content.
Electronics Sales Associate Dec 2014 – Dec 2015
Walmart Supercenter #5706, Little Rock, AR
  • Informed customers on wireless phones and carrier plans, troubleshooting problems regularly.
  • Continuously learned the field of consumer electronics to help customers make knowledgeable purchases.
  • Trusted to handle and sell high-value merchandise and to validate the arrival of new high-dollar items.
  • Mastered additional tasks in other departments such as photo center, sporting goods, and fabrics.
Overnight Stocker Jun 2011 – Dec 2014
Walmart Supercenter #5706, Little Rock, AR | Sep 2014 – Dec 2014
Walmart Supercenter #4460, North Little Rock, AR | Mar 2013 – Sep 2014
Walmart Supercenter #0058, Russellville, AR | Jun 2011 – Mar 2013
  • Supervised nightly operations in the department of frozen foods.
  • Actively assisted customers seeking the locations, prices, and availability of items throughout the store.
  • Maintained sales-ﬂoor and backroom inventory; rapidly mastered company software used for this purpose.
  • Expanded duties from previous stores to encompass dairy department and learn new layout upon transfer.
Administrative Assistant Aug 2008 – May 2009
Arkansas Tech University English Department, Russellville, AR
  • Entrusted with sensitive information to create, maintain, and destroy student and faculty records.
  • Acted as the department’s liaison to publishing companies by ordering desk copies of professors’ textbooks.
  • Took initiative in fulfilling specific requests of staff, students, and guests in addition to general duties.

  • Understand testing throughout development, including via source-code debuggers and console printouts.
  • Knowledgeable of file-management practices such as code legibility and version control, including Git.
  • Student of user interfaces and user experience; excelled in course on usability testing and design.
  • Worked in a pair to develop an indoor location system for Android mobile devices using Bluetooth Low Energy.
  • Written multiple data-processing programs, including a parser for a context-free grammar and a metacompiler.
  • Experience running Apache Server on Linux and creating web pages incorporating MySQL.
  • Oversaw a staﬀ of 21 as editor of Nebo: A Literary Journal to ensure careful construction of a quality periodical.
